directions.description: The step-by-step cooking instructions, with each step on a new line, e.g., '1. Mix the flour and eggs.\n2. Bake for 30 minutes.'.

ingredients.description: A list of all ingredients, with each ingredient on a new line. Include quantities and units, e.g., '1 cup of flour\n2 eggs'.

servings.description: The number of servings the recipe makes, e.g., '4 people' or '2 servings'.
